mapper.select: select * from t_bug bug left join t_user u1 on bug.creator_id = u1.id left join t_user u2 on bug.processer_id = u2.id left join t_bug_type bt on bug.bug_type_id = bt.id left join t_project p on bug.project_id = p.id left join t_iteration ite on bug.discovery_iterate_id = ite.id left join t_requirement req on bug.requirement_id = req.id where bug.id = #{bugId} and bug.deleted = 0
